tool.name: OTUTable
tool.description: Convert UCLUST from Vsearch to OTU Table
tool.help:
** what it does **
This tool is used convert the UCLUST format (.uc) from Vsearch into raw count table in tabular format. The description of UCLUST format is based on the information that can be found on UCLUST_ documentation page.
.. _UCLUST: http://www.drive5.com/uclust/uclust_userguide_1_1_579.html
--------
